section_context_for_this_product_block: PART A - SUPPLY OF ELECTRICAL ITEMS
product_entries.full_product_description: 21 | Earth Pit: Supply of Maintanance Free (chemical) Earth electrode  4 mtr long, 100 mm dia suitable for rocky area with all parts including required hardware for earth pit as required as per IS 3043.    The pipe shall be embedded as far as possible vertically into the ground, except when hard rock is encountered, where it may be burled inclined to the vertical, the inclination being limited to 30 degree from the vertical. The connection of MS flat to each electrode shall be made through MS links by bolted joints to enable isolation of the electrode for testing purposes. . This is included with excavation, restoration and removal extra earth/rock. and required test link for checking earth connectivity.as per specification,Attachment-29  LPG.ENG.117.06.03.2001, IS and direction of Engineer-in-charge icludingincluding supply of commissioning and 2 years O&M spares.
product_entries.feature_or_specifications: type: maintenance free (chemical) earth electrode, suitable for: rocky area, included: all parts, hardware, test link, application: earth pit, standard: indian standard 3043, installation: vertical or up to 30 degree inclined, connection: ms(mild steel) flat with ms links by bolted joints, included: excavation, restoration, removal of extra earth/rock, specification: as per specification, attachment-29 lpg.eng.117.06.03.2001, included: supply of commissioning and 2 years o&m(operation & maintenance) spares

section_context_for_this_product_block: PART A - SUPPLY OF CONTROL  & INSTRUMENTATION (C & I) WORKS  (INSTRUMENTATION, AUTOMATION, CCTV, ILSD, GMS, TFMS, ACS WORKS  ETC)
product_entries.full_product_description: 1.1.1 | Supply of pressure transmitter (24 V DC) Exd type, 2 nos. with each DV (1 nos. for air line & 1 no. for water line) Description:IP-66,  EExia IIA IIB, T3 (ATEX /CENELEC),CCOE 4 ~ 20 mA +HART, Range: 0~7kg/cm2 (11 nos.) & 0~15kg/cm2 (11 Nos ), Acuracy:0.075% of span. Rangeability – 1:100  , service: water & Air, SS316 cable gland. refer tender specification for detail.
product_entries.size: voltage: 24 v dc, range: 0~7 kg/cm2 (11 nos.), range: 0~15 kg/cm2 (11 nos.)
product_entries.feature_or_specifications: type: exd, included: 2 nos. with each dv(deluge valve) (1 nos. for air line & 1 no. for water line), protection: ip-66, certification: eexia iia iib, t3 (atex /cenelec), ccoe, output: 4~20 ma +hart, accuracy: 0.075% of span, rangeability: 1:100, service: water & air, cable gland: ss316(stainless steel 316)

TEST  LINK
TAPE CLIP
TEE JOINT

Earth Pit: Supply of Maintanance Free (chemical) Earth electrode with all parts including required hardware for earth pit (equipment earthing, Neutral earthing and for lightning protection) and required test link for checking earth connectivity.as per specification,Attachment-29  LPG.ENG.117.06.03.2001, IS and direction of Engineer-in-charge icludingincluding supply of commissioning and 2 years O&M spares.
Earth pit for Body Earthing ( BEP)
Earth pit for Lightning Earthing ( LEP)
Earth pit for Neutral Earthing ( NEP)
Instrument earth pit (IEP)

Earth Pit: Supply of Maintanance Free (chemical) Earth electrode  4 mtr long, 100 mm dia suitable for rocky area with all parts including required hardware for earth pit as required as per IS 3043.    The pipe shall be embedded as far as possible vertically into the ground, except when hard rock is encountered, where it may be burled inclined to the vertical, the inclination being limited to 30 degree from the vertical. The connection of MS flat to each electrode shall be made through MS links by bolted joints to enable isolation of the electrode for testing purposes. . This is included with excavation, restoration and removal extra earth/rock. and required test link for checking earth connectivity.as per specification,Attachment-29  LPG.ENG.117.06.03.2001, IS and direction of Engineer-in-charge icludingincluding supply of commissioning and 2 years O&M spares.
GENERAL SAFETY  EQUIPMENT
11 kV, 900mm wide, electric grade floor rubber mat conforming to relevant IS. ISI mark shall be there on rubber mat.
1.1 kV, 900mm wide, electric grade floor rubber mat (in pieces of length not less than 2 mtrs.) conforming to relevant IS. ISI mark shall be there on rubber mat.
Rubber Hand Gloves  of 11 KV grade.
Rubber Hand Gloves  of 415V grade.
First  aid  box  of GI, 18 SWG sheet with necessary items.
DANGER PLATE (As per IS 2551)
CABLE ROUTE  MARKER
CO2 fire extinguishers 5kg with fixing bracket
ABC Dry chemical powder (DCP)  fire extinguishers 5kg with fixing bracket
Shock treatment chart
Fire buckets (4nos.) with sand & M.S. Hooks / stand
CONTROL  & INSTRUMENTATION WORKS
PART A - SUPPLY OF CONTROL  & INSTRUMENTATION (C & I) WORKS  (INSTRUMENTATION, AUTOMATION, CCTV, ILSD, GMS, TFMS, ACS WORKS  ETC)

Note: 1. All items under this section shall be quoted for supply to site including charges towards packing and forwarding, loading, unloading, transportation, insurance etc. Third party inspection for the supply items shall be in tenderer's scope. Approval of TPI agency shall be obtained from IOCL/EPMC on award of contract & engaged for inspection & clearance of all materials as per agreed QAP to be firmed up after placement of order by IOCL/EPMC.
FIRE DETECTION SYSTEM
Presssure Transmitter & solenoid valve for Deluge valve

Supply of pressure transmitter (24 V DC) Exd type, 2 nos. with each DV (1 nos. for air line & 1 no. for water line) Description:IP-66,  EExia IIA IIB, T3 (ATEX /CENELEC),CCOE 4 ~ 20 mA +HART, Range: 0~7kg/cm2 (11 nos.) & 0~15kg/cm2 (11 Nos ), Acuracy:0.075% of span. Rangeability – 1:100  , service: water & Air, SS316 cable gland. refer tender specification for detail.
Supply flameproof solenoid valve (24V DC) suitable for Hazardous area zone-1, IIA/IIB T3, 1/2" NPT connection as per specification (9 nos for DV+2 Nos spares)
